title: Plinth - means the portion of a structure between the surface of the surrounding ground and surface of the floor immediately above the ground
clause_text: Plinth - means the portion of a structure between the surface of the surrounding ground and surface of the floor immediately above the ground. Plot / Site - means a parcel or piece of land enclosed by definite boundaries.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Plinth - means the portion of a structure between the surface of the surrounding ground and surface of the floor immediately above the ground.
